title: Kare to Kanojo ga Uso wo Tsuku Hi
original_name: 彼と彼女がウソをつく日
sinopse:
To Yui, studying was her only merit. She worked so hard to see the person. She admires but someone told her she has any charm… That’s why Yui tried hard to get the attention Of Arima. They started going out together. But Yui’s mother is against our relationship. Plus, Arima has a secret!! What happen to those two…?!

(Source: Chibi Manga)
